nodes.text: Meridat Stato was a female Human who lived during the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. A merchant like her relatives Felusia, Nelva, and Clem, Meridat Stato sold furniture and decorations on the space station Vaiken Spacedock.

A Decorations vendor who appears on the Imperial Fleet, Meridat Stato was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the 2014 Digital Expansion Galactic Strongholds. While her fellow merchants Clem Stato and Estah Kloy appear on both the Imperial and Republic Fleets, Meridat Stato is replaced by Nelva Stato on the Republic Fleet.
